metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1082 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Moodle 3.4 to 3.4.1, and 3.3 to 3.3.4. If a useraccount using OAuth2 authentication method was once confirmed but latersuspended, the user could still login to the site.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
